item.title: Erinn add a quote by William Lyon Phelps
item.description: "The happiest people are those who think the most interesting thoughts. Those who decide to use leisure as a means of mental development, who love good music, good books, good pictures, good company, good conversation, are the happiest people in the world. And they are not only happy in themselves, they are the cause of happiness in others." -- William Lyon Phelps

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Vincent Van Gogh
item.description: "I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things." -- Vincent Van Gogh

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Nathaniel Hawthorne
item.description: "Happiness is like a butterfly which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you." -- Nathaniel Hawthorne

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Elizabeth Harrison
item.description: "Those who are lifting the world upward and onward are those who encourage more than criticize." -- Elizabeth Harrison

item.title: Erinn add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "Itâ€™s a very funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Palmer Sondreal
item.description: "Happiness is never stopping to think if you are." -- Palmer Sondreal

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Erinn add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
